name: Nature Clicker
description:
Nature Clicker is a clicker game made in 24 hours.

It was made as a challange/video for the youtube channel: Deynum Studio.
The goal of the game is basically to get a high score.
It only take about 20 minutes to get to the point where things visualy don't change anymore (because of time contrains while making the game) but after that you can still play infinitely.
